articles.description: Two-time Olympic 100m medallist Fred Kerley is arrested in Miami for allegedly punching former partner Alaysha Johnson, according to police.

articles.description: Ipswich come from two goals down to secure a draw at Everton in the hosts' penultimate game at Goodison Park.

articles.description: Seven-time world champion Ronnie O'Sullivan, who has a snooker academy in Saudi Arabia, says he will start "a new life somewhere else".
